survey_name: Customer Satisfaction Survey for Electric Bicycle Rentals
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of electric bicycle rental services to understand their satisfaction levels, usage patterns, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use electric bicycle rental services?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice question to simplify response collection.

script.question_text: How frequently do you use electric bicycle rental services?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric bicycle rentals?
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option to capture diverse responses.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional open-text for 'Other'.

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using electric bicycle rentals?

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric bicycles at rental stations?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for measuring satisfaction levels.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the availability of electric bicycles at rental stations?

questions.question_text: What features do you value the most in an electric bicycle rental service? (Select up to 3)
questions.client_notes: Allow multi-choice to understand prioritized features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (multi-choice with max 3 selections).

script.question_text: What features do you value the most in an electric bicycle rental service? (Select up to 3)

questions.question_text: Please share any suggestions for improving the electric bicycle rental service.
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: Please share any suggestions for improving the electric bicycle rental service.
